ew-extension.name: CAPTCHA
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use CAPTCHA or reCAPTCHA
Requires PHP GD2 library, update your PHP version to the latest version and enable the GD2 library if necessary.
reCAPTCHA is OPTIONAL. If you choose to use reCAPTCHA, note that reCAPTCHA is a Web service, meaning that the CAPTCHA images are served directly from reCAPTCHA's servers to the end users, the end users need to be online.
IMPORTANT NOTE for reCAPTCHA, you MUST: - register at the reCAPTCHA Web site (https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin) and obtain public and private keys, otherwise reCAPTCHA will not work - enable PHP extension php_openssl.dll
For localhost support of reCAPTCHA, read: https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/faq#localhost_support
To customize reCAPTCHA, read: https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/
Note: This CAPTCHA extension is not part of PHPMaker, no technical support will be provided.
